metadata.title: CVE-2016-8681 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The _dwarf_get_abbrev_for_code function in dwarf_util.c in libdwarf 20161001 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) by calling the dwarfdump command on a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-8681` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20161001-2
libdwarf1 - 20161001-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161001-2').
